data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Çankiri, Turkey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Çankiri, Turkey
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Çankiri, Turkey will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Çankiri, Turkey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Çankiri, Turkey to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, bring yourself glory in Çankiri. Through your servants plant 38 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Çankiri, Turkey.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Çankiri, Turkey has a population of 190,900.

We estimate Çankiri has 72 people who might know Jesus, 1,069 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 189,760 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,651 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Çankiri you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.
